name: Apple iPhone 15
description: Apple iPhone 15 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, A16 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance, and a dual-camera system with improved low-light capabilities. Comes with iOS 17, Dynamic Island, and USB-C charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23
description: Samsung Galaxy S23 offers a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a pro-grade triple camera setup. Boasts a premium design, all-day battery life, and Android 13 with One UI 5.

name: OnePlus 12
description: OnePlus 12 comes equipped with a 6.7-inch AMOLED QHD+ display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, and Hasselblad-tuned triple cameras. Features a 5400mAh battery with 100W fast charging and OxygenOS 14.

name: Redmi Note 13 Pro
description: Redmi Note 13 Pro features a 6.67-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity processor, and a 200MP main camera. Offers solid battery life with 67W turbocharging and MIUI 14 based on Android 13.

name: Realme Narzo 60
description: Realme Narzo 60 offers a 6.43-inch AMOLED display, MediaTek Dimensity 6020 processor, and a 64MP AI camera. Backed by a 5000mAh battery with 33W fast charging, ideal for mid-range users.
